entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 38.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 38. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 35.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
